prompts.prompt: Create a simple process flow diagram for: {processDescription}. Output as PlantUML code, showing all main steps as nodes and arrows for the flow.

template.name: diagram-process-flow
template.title: Process flow diagram
template.description: Generates a process flow diagram (PlantUML) for a described process.

arguments.name: processDescription
arguments.description: Short description of the process to visualize.

prompts.prompt: Convert this text into a mindmap diagram using Mermaid format. Central topic: {centralTopic}. Use the provided key points as branches.

template.name: diagram-mindmap
template.title: Mindmap diagram
template.description: Turns a central topic and branches into a Mermaid mindmap diagram.

arguments.name: centralTopic
arguments.description: The main subject of the mindmap.

arguments.name: keyPoints
arguments.description: A comma-separated list of key points to use as mindmap branches.

prompts.prompt: Summarize the following problem and possible causes as an Ishikawa (fishbone) diagram using PlantUML. Main problem: {mainProblem}. Causes: {causesList}.

template.name: diagram-fishbone
template.title: Fishbone (Ishikawa) diagram
template.description: Generates a PlantUML fishbone diagram for a problem and its causes.

arguments.name: mainProblem
arguments.description: The central problem for the fishbone diagram.

prompts.prompt: Create an entity-relationship diagram (ERD) in PlantUML for the following entities and their relationships: {entitiesAndRelations}.

template.name: diagram-erd
template.title: Entity-relationship diagram
template.description: Builds a PlantUML ERD diagram based on described entities and relationships.

arguments.name: entitiesAndRelations
arguments.description: A textual description of entities and how they relate.

prompts.prompt: Visualize the following project timeline as a Gantt chart using Mermaid. Project steps: {projectSteps}.

template.name: diagram-gantt
template.title: Gantt chart
template.description: Generates a Mermaid Gantt chart for a given project timeline.

arguments.name: projectSteps
arguments.description: List of project steps with start and end dates (or durations).

prompts.prompt: Create a sequence diagram that visualizes the interaction between the following actors: {actorsList}. Focus on the main message exchanges and keep it simple.

template.name: diagram-sequence
template.title: Sequence diagram
template.description: Builds a PlantUML sequence diagram to show interaction flow between listed actors.

arguments.name: actorsList
arguments.description: Comma-separated list of actors or systems involved in the interaction.

prompts.prompt: Generate a flowchart that outlines the decision-making steps for: {decisionTopic}. Include key decision points and possible outcomes.

template.name: diagram-decision-flowchart
template.title: Decision flowchart
template.description: Creates a Mermaid flowchart showing steps, decisions, and outcomes for a given topic.

arguments.name: decisionTopic
arguments.description: Briefly describe the decision process or scenario to visualize.

prompts.prompt: Visualize the following system architecture as a component diagram using PlantUML. Components: {componentList}. Show how they connect or interact.

template.name: diagram-component
template.title: Component diagram
template.description: Generates a PlantUML component diagram based on provided system components.

arguments.name: componentList
arguments.description: Comma-separated list of system components and a brief description of their relationships.

prompts.prompt: Create a state diagram that illustrates the possible states and transitions for: {systemOrProcess}. Use PlantUML state diagram syntax.

template.name: diagram-state
template.title: State diagram
template.description: Creates a PlantUML state diagram for the states and transitions of a process or system.

arguments.name: systemOrProcess
arguments.description: Name and brief description of the system or process to visualize.

prompts.prompt: Summarize the following data flow as a data flow diagram (DFD) using PlantUML. Describe entities, data stores, and the flow of data between them: {dataFlowDescription}.

template.name: diagram-dataflow
template.title: Data flow diagram
template.description: Builds a PlantUML data flow diagram (DFD) based on described entities and flows.

arguments.name: dataFlowDescription
arguments.description: Textual description of data sources, sinks, stores, and flows.
